title: Linen Closet, Conference/Meeting room, Community web site
posting_body: This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 669 - 1061 Sq.

In a neighborhood historically called Little Scandinavia, Ballard on the Park embodies the Danish concept of deep contentment and cozy well-being—known as hygge—by blending an inviting, convivial atmosphere with the warm wood tones and clean lines of contemporary Scandinavian design.
Come home to a comfortable studio, one or two bedroom home that pairs an intuitive layout and modern features with access to resident amenities that enhance your relaxation and satisfaction.

Walk-In Closets, Dining Room, Views, Island Kitchen, Oven, Instant Hot Water, Linen Closet, Den, Range, Carpet, Stainless Steel Appliances, Pantry, Dishwasher, Refrigerator, Disposal, Granite Countertops, Kitchen, Eat-in Kitchen, Vaulted Ceiling, Freezer, Ice Maker, Window Coverings, Microwave, Tile Floors

On-call Courtesy Patrol, Wired for high-speed internetPackage Service, Professional Demonstration Kitchen, Well maintained grounds, High-speed internet access, Package Lockers, Media room/theater, Courtyard, Community web site, Controlled Access, Walk to bus line, 24hr.
Emergency maintenance, Bike Repair Station - Fully Equipped, Conference/Meeting room, 24hr.

Business center, Short-term lease, Covered parking for some cars, Cable Ready, Green and flowered areas, Outdoor hot tub, BBQ/Picnic Area, Pet Washing Station, Property Manager on Site, Security System, Controlled building access, Intercom entry system
We welcome 2 pets per apartment home.
There is a $300 pet deposit per pet, and a $50 monthly pet rent.
Other animals must remain in a cage.
Please call for complete pet policy information.
Other animals must remain in a cage.

We do not accept Comprehensive Reusable Tenant Screening Reports as defined by and pursuant to RCW 59.18.
